snippet: Many Silicon Valley companies aren’t making the trip to Austin, Tex., for the South by Southwest festival this year, but there are plenty of replacements from all over the globe.
abstract: Many Silicon Valley companies are declining to attend this years South by Southwest festival in Austin, Tex, once a hotbed for American tech entrepreneurs; gap will be offset by influx of foreign companies as start-up world begins to survey the globe for new opportunities in the wake of Facebook's $19 billion acquisition of WhatsApp.
lead_paragraph: Many Silicon Valley companies aren’t making the trip to Austin, Tex., for the South by Southwest festival this year, but there are plenty of replacements from all over the globe.

headline.main: Foreign Influx Gives Annual Tech Event an International Flavor
headline.print_headline: Foreign Influx Gives Annual Tech Event an International Flavor

keywords.value: South by Southwest Music and Media Conference
